mapper.select:
SELECT taskid, CASE WHEN tasktype = 1 THEN '主线' WHEN tasktype = 2 THEN '支线' ELSE '未知' END AS tasktype, taskname, tasklevel, IFNULL(sum(acceptnum), 0) accepttotal, IFNULL(sum(completenum), 0) completetotal, round(IFNULL(sum(times) / completenum, 0),2)avgtime, round(IFNULL(sum(completenum) / sum(acceptnum),0)*100,2) completerate FROM czz_task_stat
GROUP BY taskid, tasklevel, tasktype, taskname

SELECT SUM(IF(type = 1, count, 0)) AS gamestart, SUM(IF(type = 2, count, 0)) AS getaddress, SUM(IF(type = 3, count, 0)) AS updatecheck, SUM(IF(type = 4, count, 0)) AS regist, SUM(IF(type = 5, count, 0)) AS startgame, SUM(IF(type = 6, count, 0)) AS entergame FROM czz_regist_stat

SELECT b.actorlevel,sum(b.count) persons, sum(IF(b.money = 6, count, 0)) AS six, sum(IF(b.money = 12, count, 0)) AS twelve, sum(IF(b.money = 30, count, 0)) AS thirty, sum(IF(b.money = 68, count, 0)) AS se, sum(IF(b.money = 128, count, 0)) AS ote, sum(IF(b.money = 328, count, 0)) AS tte, sum(IF(b.money = 648, count, 0)) AS ste FROM ( SELECT actorlevel, money, count(DISTINCT uid, actorid) count FROM logplat_actor_recharge
and isfirst = 1 AND money IN (6, 12, 30, 68, 128, 328, 648)
GROUP BY actorlevel, money ) b
GROUP BY b.actorlevel

SELECT a.money, count(DISTINCT a.uid, a.actorid) persons, c.count1, round(count(DISTINCT a.uid, a.actorid) / c.count1*100,2) personsaf, count(*) rechargeCount, d.count2, round(count(*) / d.count2*100,2) countaf FROM logplat_actor_recharge a, ( SELECT sum(b.count) count1 FROM ( SELECT count(DISTINCT uid, actorid) count FROM logplat_actor_recharge
GROUP BY money ) b ) c, ( SELECT count(*) count2 FROM logplat_actor_recharge
) d
GROUP BY a.money
